content.rendered:
Gateway to UNESCO's Great Himalayan National Park

Boutique mountain retreat in
Tirthan Valley

Lowest Altitude
0 M
Highest Altitude
0 M

Best Luxury Hotels & Resorts in Tirthan Valley

EXPERIENCE UNESCO's GREAT HIMALAYAN NATIONAL PARK
Our flame-inspired warmth meets riverside luxury in our thoughtfully crafted spaces. Experience authentic Himalayan hospitality, pristine nature trails and sacred culinary rituals just minutes from India's celebrated wilderness preserve.
INDULGE IN THE ULTIMATE HIMALAYAN ADVENTURES

YOUR VACATION PARADISE

Outdoors
River Crossing
Outdoors
Valley Hiking
Outdoors
Local Village Tours
Outdoors
Bird Watching
Discover the Services we offer

The Essentials

Local Transport Service

Helping you explore Tirthan Valley effortlessly

Daily Housekeeping

Ensuring your stay is comfortable and hassle-free.

Wifi

Stay connected with the world while immersing in nature.

Laundry Services

Fresh clothes, no worries - we've got you covered.

Breakfast in the Orchard

Start your day with a hearty meal amidst apple trees.

Private Riverside Access

Soak in the tranquillity by the pristine Tirthan river.

Discover Our Accommodations

Rooms. Suites.

Explore All Accommodations
From ₹8,800

Rhododendron Suite

  • 391 ft2
  • 3 Guests
  • 1 Beds
  • 1 Bathroom
  • Free WIFI
  • Breakfast
From ₹6,300

Wildflower Nook

  • 216 ft2
  • 2 Guests
  • 1 Bed
  • 1 Bathroom
  • Free WIFI
  • Breakfast
Local Activities & Events

DIVE INTO THE RICH AND VIBRANT LIFE OF TIRTHAN VALLEY

Organic Bounty: Locally Sourced

Immerse yourself in the rich offerings of Tirthan Valley’s organic harvest. Indulge in a variety of locally grown fruits and vegetables, including apples, pears, figs, and peaches, straight from our own orchards. Embrace the flavor of nature’s bounty.

Wildlife Wonderland

Embark on an exploration of the Great Himalayan National Park, home to diverse wildlife such as snow leopards, brown bears, and musk deer. Let Tirthan Valley’s natural wonders captivate you on this adventurous journey.

Captivating Delights

Discover Tirthan Valley’s beauty and attractions. From Serolsar Lake and Chhoie Waterfall to Jalori Pass and Jibhi, be awed by nature’s wonders. Marvel at landmarks like the Budhi Nagin Temple and Raghupur Fort. Embrace an unforgettable journey through the captivating Tirthan Valley.

RESERVE YOUR EXPERIENCE NOW
Experience the authentic spirit of Tirthan Valley, a hidden gem of Himachal Pradesh. Discover Himalayan culture, pristine riverside nature and warm local hospitality near UNESCO’s Great Himalayan National Park.

Learn More 

Back To Top
